author: mseidel42
body:
#### PR description:

Fixing `error: use of deleted function 'Rivet::DressedLeptons& Rivet::DressedLeptons::operator=(Rivet::DressedLeptons&&)'` from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/9006#issuecomment-1941177826

#### PR validation:

Running updated ParticleLevelProducer test successfully.
title: Adapt ParticleLevelProducer for Rivet 3.1.10
